bug.author: mzmssg
bug.summary: "View job" button on vc page doesn't work as expected
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>v0.12:</denchmark-h>
on vc page, click View Jobs of default vc then back to vc page, click View Jobs of test vc
it will jump to a job list page with both default & test <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11887940/58699088-458f5100-83cf-11e9-8827-6271206d58c7.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11887940/58699058-2e506380-83cf-11e9-838e-0394010d4816.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h1>v0.13:</denchmark-h>
View Jobs does't filter jobs by vc <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11887940/58699474-23e29980-83d0-11e9-91b8-151db64a25bd.png></denchmark-link>
